body:
<!--

    Please do *NOT* ask usage questions in Github issues.

    If your issue is not a feature request or bug report use:
    https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/prometheus-users. If
    you are unsure whether you hit a bug, search and ask in the
    mailing list first.

    You can find more information at: https://prometheus.io/community/

-->

**What did you do?**

Hide inactive alerts on `/new/alerts`. 

**What did you expect to see?**
When hiding inactive alerts, I expect them to stay hidden after going another page and back to `/new/alerts`, or refreshing. Just like the current behaviour on the `/alerts` page

**What did you see instead? Under which circumstances?**
Revisiting the React UI `/new/alerts` page will have all three options enabled again.

**Environment**
Ubuntu 18.04 LTS, cloudalchemy.prometheus ansible role. Binaries come from github.
* System information:

`Linux 5.0.0-1035-azure x86_64`

* Prometheus version:

```
prometheus, version 2.18.1 (branch: HEAD, revision: ecee9c8abfd118f139014cb1b174b08db3f342cf)
  build user:       root@2117a9e64a7e
  build date:       20200507-16:51:47
  go version:       go1.14.2
```

* Alertmanager version:
Not relevant to the issue

* Prometheus configuration file:
Not relevant to the issue

* Alertmanager configuration file:
Not relevant to the issue

* Logs:
Not relevant to the issue
title: React UI: Alert filters are not remembered
